channel.title: Minecraft Support
channel.description:
If you are having problems with running, logging in or anything related, post the problem here. I will give a work around for your problem.
Before posting a graphic card issue, please update to your latest drivers; I will help if you struggle to do that.
Also, make sure you have the [b][u]Minimum Requirements:[/u][/b] [b]CPU:[/b] 1.5+ GHz multi-core processor, 2.0+ GHz single-core processor [b]RAM/Memory:[/b] 1.0+ GB for Xp, 1.5+ GB for Windows 7-32 bit, 2.0+ GB for Vista/Mac OS, 3.0+ GB for Windows 7-64 bit [b]Graphic card:[/b] Must support OpenGL 1.4 or better.
If you don't know your computer specifications, then go to "run" on your computer and type "dxdiag". This will bring up a menu similar to this one. These are my specifications.
[b]CPU:[/b] [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/CPU.png[/img]
[b]Ram:[/b] [IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/RAM.png[/img]
[b]Graphic card: - Remember to update the graphic card to the current latest driver.[/b]
[IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/graphic.png[/img]
So before you post a problem, make sure you have the minimum requirements and have updated to your latest graphic drivers. If you need help upgrading to your latest drivers, I will assist you :)

item.title: Minecraft Support
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“justinxg27, post:15, topic:376801”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=472721.msg3457584#msg3457584 date=1294166957]

[quote author=justinxg27 link=topic=472721.msg3457549#msg3457549 date=1294164347]
I just found your pastebin dxdiag, and dude… your computer is about as old as it gets…

The recommended ram is 1GB for xp - You have 320mb…

The required processor is 1.5ghz - You have:
Processor: AMD Athlon™ Processor, MMX, 3DNow, ~1.2GHz

Also, your display memory is:
Display Memory: 64.0 MB - That is far too low to play almost any 3d game… unless it’s old games like Doom.

I recommend you get a new computer dude… I feel sorry for you to have to put up with that computer.
[/quote]blame canada

well this is the computer at my mum, i got for easter a couple years ago
one at my dad is older i think but way way way way better

i think 1.7 ghz and 1 gb ram
i found minecraft while at my mum and i go to my dad the 10th dec
soo… yeh ill just wait til then
[/quote]Canada has nothing to do with it. If you went down to your local computer store, I’m sure there is a computer there that lives up to today’s gaming standards.[/quote]then my only problems are:

  1. dad won’t let me
  2. i’m saving for a motorbike

Read full topic

minecraft.moparisthebest.com

item.title: Minecraft Support
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

If you are having problems with running, logging in or anything related, post the problem here. I will give a work around for your problem.

Before posting a graphic card issue, please update to your latest drivers; I will help if you struggle to do that.

Also, make sure you have the Minimum Requirements:
CPU: 1.5+ GHz multi-core processor, 2.0+ GHz single-core processor
RAM/Memory: 1.0+ GB for Xp, 1.5+ GB for Windows 7-32 bit, 2.0+ GB for Vista/Mac OS, 3.0+ GB for Windows 7-64 bit
Graphic card: Must support OpenGL 1.4 or better.

If you don’t know your computer specifications, then go to “run” on your computer and type “dxdiag”.
This will bring up a menu similar to this one. These are my specifications.

CPU:

CPU.png723×497

Ram:

RAM.png726×501

Graphic card: - Remember to update the graphic card to the current latest driver.

graphic.png725×501

So before you post a problem, make sure you have the minimum requirements and have updated to your latest graphic drivers. If you need help upgrading to your latest drivers, I will assist you

Read full topic
